changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.transitive_relationship_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, relationship bigserial NOT NULL, is_transitive boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true, authorized_relationship bigserial NOT NULL, description character varying, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT relationship_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT parent_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT child_fkey FOREIGN KEY (authorized_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE, CONSTRAINT relationship_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
